price: Então, privar-vos-íamos da Mensagem, abandonando-vos, por que sois um povo entregue a excessos?
arabic: أَفَنَضۡرِبُ عَنكُمُ ٱلذِّكۡرَ صَفۡحًا أَن كُنتُمۡ قَوۡمٗا مُّسۡرِفِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: afanaḍribu ʿankumu al-dhik'ra ṣafḥan an kuntum qawman mus'rifīna
